name: Alvida
text:
If you have 2 or more Characters with an original cost of 5 or more, this card gains +1 cost.
On Play: Place up to 1 opponent's Character with an original cost of 1 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

effect.text: Place up to 1 opponent's Character with an original cost of 1 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.
